tool_description: They Said So has more than 1 million+ quotes in the database, the largest such database in the world. And Quotes API gives easy way to access the data. Random quotes, quote of the day and bible verses are all accessible from this simple REST API.
name: They Said So - Say it with style
title: They Said So - Say it with style
tool_name: They Said So - Say it with style

api_list.name: QOD
Popular Authors
api_list.description: List of popular authors available in the system

api_list.name: Popular Categories
api_list.description: List of popular Categories available in the system

api_list.name: QOD Categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://theysaidso.p.rapidapi.com/qod/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theysaidso.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://theysaidso.p.rapidapi.com/qod/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theysaidso.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Random Quote
Search Authors
api_list.description: Search the list of  authors available in the system

api_list.name: Search Quote
api_list.description: Search the quotes database based on author, tag etc.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Query String to query. These words will be searched in the quote and the matched quotes will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: minlength
optional_parameters.description: Minimum required length of the resulting quote

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category(tag) from which you want the resulting quote from

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: Random quote from the given author
